headline.main: NAZIS SEEN IRKED OVER TRIAL IN RIOM; Hold War Guilt Inquiry Will Fail to Set Line Upon Which Hitlerites Were Counting

lead_paragraph: BERNE, Switzerland, March 2 -- Pending resumption tomorrow of the trial at Riom that is supposed to determine how far Edouard Daladier and Leon Blum, both former Premiers, are responsible for French unpreparedness for the war -- the three other defendants for the moment remain in the background -- it seems possible that there may be repercussions before the judgment of the Supreme Court specially appointed to this end.
abstract: Germans disappointed over trend of trial
